metadata.mission: Graphviz deployment reconnaissance - Priority targeting analysis
metadata.scope: Top 10 components per category based on usage frequency, system criticality, and complexity

ranking_criteria.usage_frequency: How often the component is invoked in typical workflows
ranking_criteria.system_criticality: Impact on system functionality if component fails
ranking_criteria.graphviz_priority: Numerical ranking (1 = highest priority for diagram generation)

top_10_skills.name: parallel-swarm-implementation
top_10_skills.rationale: Loop 2 META-SKILL - Core orchestrator for 86-agent registry. Compiles dynamic execution graphs. 8.3x speedup. Critical for entire system.
top_10_skills.deployment_impact: Highest - Central coordination hub for all agent workflows

top_10_skills.name: research-driven-planning
top_10_skills.rationale: Loop 1 - 6-agent research phase + 8-agent pre-mortem. Prevents 85-95% of failures. Byzantine consensus validation.
top_10_skills.deployment_impact: Critical - Upstream planning affects all downstream work

top_10_skills.name: cicd-intelligent-recovery
top_10_skills.rationale: Loop 3 - 7-agent root cause analysis. 100% test success rate. Intelligent failure recovery with Gemini 2M context.
top_10_skills.deployment_impact: Critical - Ensures quality and prevents regressions

top_10_skills.name: agent-creator
top_10_skills.rationale: Creates specialized agents using 4-phase SOP methodology. Foundation for expanding agent capabilities.
top_10_skills.deployment_impact: High - Enables system extensibility and agent development

top_10_skills.name: cascade-orchestrator
top_10_skills.rationale: Sophisticated workflow cascades with multi-model routing, ruv-swarm coordination, and audit-pipeline patterns.

top_10_skills.name: feature-dev-complete
top_10_skills.rationale: Complete 12-stage feature development lifecycle from research to deployment with Gemini Search and Codex prototyping.

top_10_skills.name: code-review-assistant
top_10_skills.rationale: Multi-agent swarm with specialized reviewers for security, performance, style, tests, and documentation.
top_10_skills.deployment_impact: High - Quality gate for all code submissions

top_10_skills.name: functionality-audit
top_10_skills.rationale: Validates actual functionality through sandbox testing. Critical theater detection mechanism.
top_10_skills.deployment_impact: High - Ensures genuine functionality vs. theater

top_10_skills.name: production-readiness
top_10_skills.rationale: Complete pre-deployment validation with audit pipeline, performance benchmarks, security scan, and deployment checklist.
top_10_skills.deployment_impact: High - Final quality gate before production

top_10_skills.name: micro-skill-creator
top_10_skills.rationale: Creates atomic, focused skills with evidence-based prompting and systematic testing. Enables rapid skill development.

top_10_agents.name: queen-seraphina
top_10_agents.rationale: Meta-orchestrator managing 86-agent registry. Central intelligence coordinating all agent selection and workflow compilation.
top_10_agents.deployment_impact: Highest - Central nervous system of entire agent ecosystem

top_10_agents.name: coder
top_10_agents.rationale: Primary implementation specialist with 55 commands and 18 MCP tools. Most frequently invoked agent for actual code generation.

top_10_agents.name: tester
top_10_agents.rationale: QA specialist with comprehensive testing strategies. Critical quality gate with 45 commands and 18 MCP tools.

top_10_agents.name: planner
top_10_agents.rationale: Strategic planning specialist breaking down complex tasks. Upstream dependency for all major initiatives.
top_10_agents.deployment_impact: Critical - Upstream planning affects all work

top_10_agents.name: reviewer
top_10_agents.rationale: Code review and quality assurance with security audit, performance analysis, and standards compliance.
top_10_agents.deployment_impact: Critical - Quality gate for all submissions

top_10_agents.name: researcher
top_10_agents.rationale: Information gathering and analysis specialist. Critical for Loop 1 research phase in research-driven-planning.

top_10_agents.name: hierarchical-coordinator
top_10_agents.rationale: Tree-based command structure with delegation patterns. Critical for organizing complex swarm topologies.

top_10_agents.name: mesh-coordinator
top_10_agents.rationale: Peer-to-peer full connectivity with CRDT synchronization. Enables distributed consensus and fault tolerance.

top_10_agents.name: adaptive-coordinator
top_10_agents.rationale: Dynamic topology switching with neural pattern recognition. Adapts coordination strategy to workload.

top_10_agents.name: byzantine-coordinator
top_10_agents.rationale: Byzantine fault-tolerant consensus with multi-agent validation. Critical for distributed decision-making.

top_10_commands.name: /claude-flow-swarm
top_10_commands.rationale: Multi-agent swarm coordination for complex tasks. Central command for initiating all swarm operations.

top_10_commands.name: /claude-flow-memory
top_10_commands.rationale: CRDT-based memory system for cross-agent coordination. Foundation for agent communication and state management.
top_10_commands.deployment_impact: Critical - Enables agent collaboration and context sharing

top_10_commands.name: /sparc
top_10_commands.rationale: SPARC methodology orchestrator with 5 phases and 15+ specialist modes. Complete development workflow automation.

top_10_commands.name: /sparc:code
top_10_commands.rationale: Auto-Coder writing clean, efficient, modular code. Most frequently invoked SPARC mode for implementation.

top_10_commands.name: /sparc:integration
top_10_commands.rationale: System Integrator merging all mode outputs into working system. Final assembly and cohesion verification.

top_10_commands.name: /sparc:security-review
top_10_commands.rationale: Security Reviewer performing static and dynamic audits. Critical quality gate for production deployments.

top_10_commands.name: /sparc:spec-pseudocode
top_10_commands.rationale: Specification Writer capturing requirements and translating to pseudocode. Foundation for all implementation work.

top_10_commands.name: /sparc:debug
top_10_commands.rationale: Debugger troubleshooting runtime bugs and logic errors. Critical for failure recovery and issue resolution.

top_10_commands.name: /sparc:sparc
top_10_commands.rationale: SPARC Orchestrator breaking down large objectives into delegatable workflows. Meta-coordinator for SPARC system.

top_10_commands.name: /sparc:refinement-optimization-mode
top_10_commands.rationale: Optimizer refactoring and improving system performance. Quality improvement and technical debt reduction.

comprehensive_statistics.deployment_complexity: Very High - Interconnected multi-layer system with 269 components

components.name: Three-Loop Architecture
components.rationale: Core system architecture. All other workflows depend on this foundation.

components.name: Queen Seraphina & Agent Registry
components.rationale: Central intelligence managing all agent coordination. Critical for understanding system behavior.

components.name: Core Orchestration Commands
components.rationale: Primary user interfaces for system interaction. Most frequently invoked entry points.

success_metrics: Users can understand system architecture at a glance
Agent coordination flows are visually documented
Entry points and workflows are clear

components.name: Core Development Agents
components.rationale: Most frequently used agents. Critical for daily development work.

components.name: SPARC Core Modes
components.rationale: Primary SPARC methodology interfaces. Used in every development cycle.

components.name: Quality Assurance Skills
components.rationale: Critical quality gates. Prevent regressions and ensure production readiness.

components.name: Swarm Coordination Agents
components.rationale: Enable different coordination topologies. Critical for understanding multi-agent orchestration.

components.name: Advanced Orchestration Skills
components.rationale: Enable complex workflow composition and system extensibility.

components.name: GitHub Integration
components.rationale: Enable repository management and CI/CD workflows. Important for DevOps.

components.name: Multi-Model Routing
components.rationale: Enable intelligent model selection and routing. Advanced optimization.

components.name: Specialized Development
components.rationale: Enable domain-specific workflows. Expand system capabilities.

risk_mitigation: Start with critical infrastructure (Phase 1) to validate approach
Iterative feedback from users on diagram clarity
Automated testing for diagram generation pipeline
success_criteria: All top 30 components have comprehensive diagrams

quick_wins.impact: Very High - Single diagram explaining entire system flow
High - Shows all 86+ agents and their relationships

conclusion.summary: Identified 269 total components (73 skills, 104 agents, 92 commands) requiring Graphviz documentation. Top 30 components represent 80% of system usage and criticality.
key_insights: Three-Loop Architecture (Loops 1-3) is the foundation - must be documented first
Queen Seraphina manages 86-agent registry - central to understanding system coordination
Core development agents (coder, tester, reviewer, planner, researcher) are used in every workflow
SPARC methodology provides structured development process with 15+ modes
Quality gates (functionality-audit, production-readiness, code-review) prevent failures
Swarm coordination enables different topologies (hierarchical, mesh, adaptive, byzantine)
Multi-model routing (Claude, Gemini, Codex) optimizes performance
GitHub integration enables repository management and CI/CD workflows
conclusion.critical_path: Phase 1 (Three-Loop Architecture + Queen Seraphina + Core Commands) blocks all other work. Must be completed first.
conclusion.recommended_start: Begin with Three-Loop Architecture Overview diagram (8 hours, very high impact) to establish foundation.
conclusion.long_term_vision: Complete visual documentation of entire system enabling rapid onboarding, efficient debugging, and confident system extension.
